item_description: A Basic Sword, good for getting started.

item_description: A mighty iron battle axe, capable of dealing significant damage.

{user} cleaves through {target} with their Iron Battle Axe, dealing {damage} damage!
{user} delivers a powerful strike with their Iron Battle Axe, inflicting {damage} damage on {target}!
{user} unleashes a devastating blow with their Iron Battle Axe, causing {damage} damage to {target}!
{user} slashes {target} with the sharp edge of their Iron Battle Axe, dealing {damage} damage!
{user} charges forward and strikes {target} with the Iron Battle Axe, dealing {damage} damage!
{user} swings the Iron Battle Axe in a wide arc, hitting {target} for {damage} damage!
{user} lands a critical hit with their Iron Battle Axe, dealing {damage} damage to {target}!

item_description: A small and lightweight iron blade, perfect for quick and stealthy attacks.

item_quotes.quote: {user} swiftly slashes at {target} with their Iron Dagger, dealing {damage} damage!
{user} stabs {target} with their Iron Dagger, inflicting {damage} damage!
{user} lunges forward and pierces {target} with their Iron Dagger, dealing {damage} damage!
{user} delivers a quick and precise strike with their Iron Dagger, causing {damage} damage to {target}!

item_description: A powerful grimoire imbued with the essence of fire.

item_quotes.quote: {user} casts a fire spell from the Flame Grimoire at {target} and deals {damage} damage!
{user} summons a flame from the Flame Grimoire, scorching {target} for {damage} damage!
{user} reads an incantation from the Flame Grimoire, a fireball hits {target} dealing {damage} damage!
{user} uses the Flame Grimoire, a wave of fire engulfs {target} causing {damage} damage!
{user} brandishes the Flame Grimoire, a pillar of fire descends on {target} dealing {damage} damage!
{user} unleashes the power of the Flame Grimoire, fire engulfs {target} dealing {damage} damage!
{user} invokes a spell from the Flame Grimoire, a fiery explosion hits {target} for {damage} damage!
{user} calls upon the Flame Grimoire, a burst of flame scorches {target} causing {damage} damage!
